powerup.upgradedwolves.enhance_speed.des: Increases the speed of this wolf
powerup.upgradedwolves.enhance_attack.de: Increases the Damage of this wolf
powerup.upgradedwolves.enhance_detect.de: Increases the ability usage of this wolf
powerup.upgradedwolves.auto_attack.name: Auto Attack Enemy
powerup.upgradedwolves.detect_enemy.name: Scout enemy
powerup.upgradedwolves.detect_enemy.desc: Upon finding an enemy, %s will detect them for some time
powerup.upgradedwolves.flee_creeper.name: Flee Creepers
powerup.upgradedwolves.flee_creeper.desc: %s will attempt to flee creepers that are about to explode
powerup.upgradedwolves.flee_health.name: Flee Battle
powerup.upgradedwolves.flee_health.descr: %s will attempt to flee from enemies while they have low health
powerup.upgradedwolves.pick_up_item.name: Item Hunter
powerup.upgradedwolves.arrow_intercept.d: %s will attempt intercept enemy arrows and other projectiles
powerup.upgradedwolves.bark_stun.name: Long Bark
powerup.upgradedwolves.bark_stun.descrip: %s will Bark loudly, stun, and stun all enemies
powerup.upgradedwolves.use_sword.name: Sword Usage
powerup.upgradedwolves.disarm_enemy.name: Enemy Disarm
powerup.upgradedwolves.disarm_enemy.desc: %s will attempt to disarm the enemy if possible
powerup.upgradedwolves.toss_arrow.name: Arrow Launch
powerup.upgradedwolves.toss_arrow.descri: %s will Launch the arrow at the nearest enemy
powerup.upgradedwolves.death_retrieval.d: %s will collect items upon it's owner's death
powerup.upgradedwolves.self_preservation: %s will automatically heal upon low health
powerup.upgradedwolves.loot_bonus.name: Sharp Sight
powerup.upgradedwolves.dig_for_item.name: Dig
powerup.upgradedwolves.dig_for_item.desc: %s will dig for items it finds
powerup.upgradedwolves.item_retrieval.de: %s will recover your items when you die
powerup.upgradedwolves.fish_catcher.name: Diver
powerup.upgradedwolves.fish_catcher.desc: %s will collect items from the water
powerup.upgradedwolves.impress.name: Show off
powerup.upgradedwolves.impress.descripti: %s will attempt to impress villagers for a reward
powerup.upgradedwolves.share_item.name: Treat Share
powerup.upgradedwolves.share_item.descri: %s share food items with friendly wolves
powerup.upgradedwolves.use_potion.name: Toss Potion
powerup.upgradedwolves.use_potion.descri: %s will toss potions towards others if necessary
